items.sentence: I can\'t tell you how much I\'ve enjoyed our time together.
I can\'t understand why it\'s taking Tom so long to decide.
I could\'ve gone to Boston with Tom, but I didn\'t want to.
Tom doesn\'t have to worry. Nothing bad\'s going to happen.
Tom signed his name with the new pen that he got from Mary.
Tom talked to Mary about things he usually kept to himself.
Tom thought Mary was the most beautiful woman in the world.
Tom told Mary that he had finished the work a few days ago.
Tom took a flower out of the vase while no one was looking.
Now that you are eighteen, you can get a driver\'s license.
This afternoon\'s meeting has been postponed till tomorrow.
Tom isn\'t the type of person who learns from his mistakes.
Tom can\'t stay for long so let\'s get the meeting started.
I wonder why Tom thought it wasn\'t a good idea to do that.
I wore glasses when I was a teenager, but I don\'t anymore.
I\'d better do something before the problem gets any worse.
I\'d like this meeting to last no more than twenty minutes.
I\'d like to spend less time at work and more time at home.
Will you please explain the meaning of this sentence to me?
You have to have an audition before you can join the choir.
